thread.title: Chelsea's John Terry puts Arsenal's Mesut Ozil to shame by showcasing his incredible kick-up skills with chewing gum
thread.title_full: Chelsea's John Terry puts Arsenal's Mesut Ozil to shame by showcasing his incredible kick-up skills with chewing gum

author: Jake Polden
title: Chelsea's John Terry puts Arsenal's Mesut Ozil to shame by showcasing his incredible kick-up skills with chewing gum
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Mesut Ozil has performed kick-ups with a piece of chewing gum on a number of occasions. 
And every time we have been impressed - well, it is pretty spectacular seeing someone keep complete control over a minuscule 'ball' before catching it in their mouth. 
Then again, the Arsenal playmaker is expected to have incredible footwork and unnatural ball control, so while you can appreciate the skill, it's not overly surprising. 
John Terry on the other hand has been Chelsea's defensive enforcer for a number of years. John Terry shows the world how it's done (Photo: johnterry.26/Instagram) Down the hatch (Photo: johnterry.26/Instagram) 
Sure he is a fantastic footballer, especially considering the position he plays, but he is better known for his tremendous bravery rather than his silky footwork. 
Perhaps this is why the above clip of him copying Ozil - some may even say bettering Ozil - and performing some kick-ups with a piece of gum is so impressive. 
We say it could be better because the original clip of the Gunners star only sees him do one kick-up before catching the gum in his mouth and smirking at the camera. Your turn, Mesut (Photo: johnterry.26/Instagram) 
And as you can see, Terry does a number of kick-ups. 
Sure it is a little messy in that he has to chase the gum about a bit, and at one point he even seems to get a helping hand from David Luiz. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
